name: The black cloak of vampiric wizardy
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It affects the users knowledge of the skill attack.
